pullrequest.title: Feature system part 4.5: use gz11 deps and update gtest

content.raw:
Starting from the `sdf_component` branch \(pull request #29\) we're going to need the `ign-math6-eigen` component, but that doesn’t seem to be available on the prerelease ppa, as far as I can tell.

What are the steps involved in getting a prerelease for the `eigen` component?
content.html:
Starting from the sdf_component branch (pull request #29) we're going to need the ign-math6-eigen component, but that doesn’t seem to be available on the prerelease ppa, as far as I can tell.

What are the steps involved in getting a prerelease for the eigen component?
